State.Author: rob_b
State.Description: Book Jackets replacement for Knights of the Nine
State.Name: Book Jackets KOTN

State.Author: Tannin - MO2 Team
State.Description: Mod Organizer (MO) is a tool for managing mod collections of arbitrary size. It is specifically designed for people who like to experiment with mods and thus need an easy and reliable way to install and uninstall them.
State.Name: Mod Organizer 2

State.Author: Daniel Pistelli
State.Description: Small .exe with sole purpose of applying >2gb patch to .exe and .dll files. Automatically makes backups of original files. Applying this to all .exe and .dll related to Oblivion MAY give some of those with 4gb plus ram a performance boost. Even then extra tweaks and additional utilities are usually necessary to optimize things.
State.Name: 4gb Ram Patcher

State.Author: dbailey56
State.Description: Meet the Association of the Crossed Quill.  They have a large 3 part quest requiring a brave adventurer.  Someone willing to travel to new locations.  Someone willing to face the kind of danger never before seen.  Could it be you?
State.Name: 3 Special Numbers

State.Description:
The Elder Scrolls IV: Oblivion
\"A Change in Management\" Mod
V 1.1
By StingingVelvet
******************************************
This mod adds the mission \"A Change in Management\"
to the game.  The mission is somewhat quick,
as this is my first mod, but it should be
enjoyable and completely passive (i.e. it
doesn\'t make any ch
State.Name: A Change in Management

State.Author: AkitoKuno
State.Description: This mod adds a small adventure that is a love letter to the awesome Knights of the Nine expansion. Expect new lore, a new dungeon, new items, 1 custom creature, 2 new types of hostile NPCs, and new meshes.
State.Name: A Posthumous Request

State.Author: Guinefort1
State.Description: Adds displayed Akaviri weapons and relics to the homes and businesses of Imperial citizens
State.Name: Akaviri Heirlooms

State.Author: WillieSea
State.Description:
A full feature base for your player character. Huge home with many things to do. You need never leave home again!

Mod of the month for April, 2008!

UPDATED TO VERSION 1.3.0 on 06/25/2008



Contains a working bathroom, full training arena, games, labled storage and display space, baking, teleports to replace fast trave
State.Name: Ancient Towers

State.Author: XMarksTheSpot-Brumbek-Ismelda
State.Description: A replacement of the Texian\'s Window Lighting System now with animated meshes with a tool to animate your own building windows. It also comes now with Chimney Smoke.
State.Name: Animated Window Lighting System and Chimneys - AWLS

State.Author: PushTheWinButton
State.Description: Attempting to harvest an ingredient will automatically harvest all plants of the same type in a small radius at once. Saves you repeatedly pressing on each plant in a patch.
State.Name: Area Harvest - Gather Nearby Plant Clusters

State.Author: PushTheWinButton
State.Description: An immersive overhaul true to the feel of the original game. Rare loot is actually rare, high level enemies only spawn at boss-level spawn points, low level enemies and items can spawn regardless of level, and a tonne of other balance tweaks for almost every aspect of the game. Oblivion, as it was meant to be!
State.Name: Ascension - Immersive Vanilla 'Overhaul'

State.Author: PushTheWinButton
State.Description: An immersive overhaul true to the feel of the original game. Rare loot is actually rare, high level enemies only spawn at boss-level spawn points, low level enemies and items can spawn regardless of level, and a tonne of other balance tweaks for almost every aspect of the game. Oblivion, as it was meant to be!
State.Name: Ascension - Immersive Vanilla 'Overhaul'

State.Author: nuska
State.Description: Replacers for vanilla female armor. Fully covering sets reworked from male versions to fit a female figure. Works with any body replacer.
State.Name: Assorted Protective Female Armors

State.Author: nuska
State.Description: Replacers for vanilla female armor. Fully covering sets reworked from male versions to fit a female figure. Works with any body replacer.
State.Name: Assorted Protective Female Armors

State.Author: nuska
State.Description: Replacers for vanilla female armor. Fully covering sets reworked from male versions to fit a female figure. Works with any body replacer.
State.Name: Assorted Protective Female Armors

State.Author: nuska
State.Description: Replacers for vanilla female armor. Fully covering sets reworked from male versions to fit a female figure. Works with any body replacer.
State.Name: Assorted Protective Female Armors

State.Author: Jake Alaimo
State.Description: Unused attribute points carry over to your next level. My take on disincentivizing min-maxing approaches to gameplay while also preserving the balance and intent of Oblivion's design as elegantly as possible.
State.Name: Attribute Progression Redesign

State.Author: qwertyasdfgh
State.Description: An overhaul and expansion of Oblivion magic system. Adds many new spell effects and changes the mechanics on existing ones, adds meaningful perks for all magic skills.
State.Name: Av Latta Magicka - Oblivion Magic Overhaul

State.Author: qwertyasdfgh
State.Description: An overhaul and expansion of Oblivion magic system. Adds many new spell effects and changes the mechanics on existing ones, adds meaningful perks for all magic skills.
State.Name: Av Latta Magicka - Oblivion Magic Overhaul

State.Author: qwertyasdfgh
State.Description: An overhaul and expansion of Oblivion magic system. Adds many new spell effects and changes the mechanics on existing ones, adds meaningful perks for all magic skills.
State.Name: Av Latta Magicka - Oblivion Magic Overhaul

State.Author: Guinefort1
State.Description: Adds some Ayleid relics to the homes of Herminia Cinna and Umbacano
State.Name: Ayleid Artifacts

State.Author: Guinefort1
State.Description: Adds crystals to the Ayleid well models
State.Name: Ayleid Well Crystals

State.Author: PushTheWinButton
State.Description: Removes level scaling from all leveled quest rewards and items, instead giving them balanced stats more like how artefacts are handled in Skyrim.
State.Name: Balanced Unleveled Rewards

State.Author: JSera
State.Description:
Ruled by Count Serverus Victrix, Bartholm is a small town consisting of a Castle, Arena, Inn, General Store, Chapel, Stables, Mages\' Guild & 8 houses.

Protected by the Bartholm Foreign Legion, the village of Slartholm is situated on the Isle of Slart.
State.Name: Bartholm

State.Author: Evandar
State.Description: This mod adds more blood, and makes it look better.
State.Name: Better Blood

State.Author: Evandar
State.Description: This mod adds more blood, and makes it look better.
State.Name: Better Blood

State.Author: Scot and WalkerInShadows
State.Description:
FINAL VERSION



This is a remake of all the caves in oblivion.
State.Name: Better dungeons

State.Author: Scot and WalkerInShadows
State.Description:
FINAL VERSION



This is a remake of all the caves in oblivion.
State.Name: Better dungeons

State.Author: Cliffworms
State.Description: This plugin changes every generic letters, notes, recipes, instructions and the such with unique ones.
State.Name: Better Letters

State.Author: xrayy
State.Description:
you have high defintion textures but your ropes are still looking ugly ?

Here is a simple HD texture replacer for you. 

just copy texture folder into the data folder and thats it.

*oct 17 update: darker worn version added*

Enjoy new and more realistic ropes
State.Name: better ropes

State.Author: shadeMe
State.Description: An OBSE plugin that adds support for gender variant head models and textures for NPCs. And allows free camera movement in the race/sex menu. And enables pain-free inventory idle overriding. And per-NPC/Race/scripted body/head texture/model overriding. And animation overriding. And equipment model overriding.
State.Name: Blockhead

State.Description:
** Note: Book Placement v2 has been released and is fully compatible with this mod. You\'ll probably like it better than version 1.2 which is linked in my readme. To find v2, click on my username... and there it is. **

Book Jackets: Oblivion is a basic retexture for all of the stock hardcover books in Oblivion, giving each title a unique textu
State.Name: Book Jackets: Oblivion Standard Res

State.Author: bryan_howard101
State.Description: A lightweight mod that marks and keeps track of all the books, posters, and notes you have read throughout the game by appending (Read) to its name. You will easily be able to see if a book has already been read simply by looking at the title. Compatible with just about everything and works with any books added by other mods.
State.Name: Book Tracker Updated

State.Author: Emerald Demond
State.Description: From the sandy beaches of the Abecean Sea to the swampy marshes of Blackwood, from the chilly windswept cliffs of Blizzard Peak to the boiling lava tunnels of the Great Mine, The Dwarves Of The Mountain takes you on the first chapter of an immerse journey, where you are thrown into a society of troubled Dwarves who are being ruled by an iron-fisted
State.Name: Chapter 1 - The Dwarves Of The Mountain

State.Author: Cobl Team
State.Description: [b]Common Oblivion (Cobl)[/b] is: 1) a world enrichment mod that adds lots of little things that enriches your gameplay experience; 2) a shared library that acts as a resource for other mods; and 3) an integration tool that allows different mods to "talk" to each other.
State.Name: Cobl

State.Author: Guinefort1
State.Description: Adds 6 explorable mini-tombs to western Cyrodiil
State.Name: Colovian Barrow Mounds

State.Author: Guinefort1
State.Description: Adds 6 explorable mini-tombs to western Cyrodiil
State.Name: Colovian Barrow Mounds

State.Author: Publick Gamer
State.Description: The beggars' inconsistent voices is probably one the most notorious and hilarious audio mistakes in gaming history. This mod rectifies that, by replacing all the male and female imperial beggar dialogue, with the original versions from earlier in development, that ARE consistent! No more mid-dialogue voice changes, hooray!
State.Name: Consistent Beggar Voices

State.Author: Zaldir
State.Description: What this mod does is to add new creatures to the existing Leveled Lists. It doesn't add new spawn points, it doesn't remove any spawn points or leveled lists - it only adds to the existing ones, extending them with new creatures. The models and textures are created by various artists.
State.Name: Creature Diversity

State.Author: Zaldir
State.Description: What this mod does is to add new creatures to the existing Leveled Lists. It doesn't add new spawn points, it doesn't remove any spawn points or leveled lists - it only adds to the existing ones, extending them with new creatures. The models and textures are created by various artists.
State.Name: Creature Diversity

State.Author: PushTheWinButton
State.Description: A fix for an engine bug which affects all chance-based creature spawns.
State.Name: Creature Spawn Chance Fix

State.Author: Enter_77
State.Description: Adds a museum dedicated to the Daedra north of the Orange Road and south of Bruma. Store Daedric artifacts here for safe keeping, teleport to Daedra shrines, and view other Daedra related exhibits.
State.Name: Daedric Museum of Artifacts

State.Author: Deathless Aphrodite
State.Description:
Daggerfall Memories: The Liberation of Cybiades
Version: 2.1
by Deathless Aphrodite

An adventure taking place on Cybiades island, straight from the Daggerfall game.
Tons of new content, npcs, creatures, dialogue and much more. And a very original dungeon.
State.Name: Daggerfall Memories - Cybiades

State.Author: Deathless Aphrodite
State.Description:
Daggerfall Memories: The Liberation of Cybiades
Version: 2.1
by Deathless Aphrodite

An adventure taking place on Cybiades island, straight from the Daggerfall game.
Tons of new content, npcs, creatures, dialogue and much more. And a very original dungeon.
State.Name: Daggerfall Memories - Cybiades

State.Author: Deathless Aphrodite
State.Description:
Daggerfall Memories: The Liberation of Cybiades
Version: 2.1
by Deathless Aphrodite

An adventure taking place on Cybiades island, straight from the Daggerfall game.
Tons of new content, npcs, creatures, dialogue and much more. And a very original dungeon.
State.Name: Daggerfall Memories - Cybiades

State.Author: Polycrates
State.Description:
See http://www.elderscrolls.com/forums/index.php?showtopic=554562 for more info

This mod contains a complete Dremora city in the Oblivion planes, complete with an extensive questline.
The city contains: a number of private residences, a council hall/museum, a smithy, an alchemist\'s, a xivilai ice mage\'s dwelling, an arena/bloodworks, a te
State.Name: Damarask

State.Author: lmstearn
State.Description: BAIN install packages for popular UI mods originally bundled as Fomods for OBMM. Wrye Bash, still being maintained and supported for Oblivion is now the first choice for players of Oblivion.
State.Name: UI Wizard Installer Packages for Wrye Bash

State.Author: Guinefort1
State.Description: Adds the corpses of slain guards and civilians to the ruins of Kvatch
State.Name: Devastation of Kvatch

State.Author: Guinefort1
State.Description: Adds the corpses of slain guards and civilians to the ruins of Kvatch
State.Name: Devastation of Kvatch

State.Author: migck
State.Description: Restores a few lines of dialogue and overhauls how some of it works.
State.Name: Dialogue Tweaks Fixes and Restorations

State.Author: Laulajatar
State.Description: This mod adds detailed perk descriptions in skill tooltips. Supports some mods adding custom perks and customized texts.
State.Name: Display Skill Perk Effects

State.Author: Guinefort1
State.Description: Adds Morrowind-themed clutter to Cheydinhal.
State.Name: Dunmerized Cheydinhal

State.Author: TheNiceOne
State.Description: Your world map displays correct terrain for the active mods you have. Also let you zoom your world map in/out.
State.Name: Dynamic Map

State.Author: Tharkun221
State.Description: This mod improves the game's melee combat system while maintaining the overall balance and feel of Oblivion combat.  It gives combat more dynamism, variety, and depth by adding features to both the player and the opponent's combat mechanics.
State.Name: Dynamic Oblivion Combat

State.Author: Iliana
State.Description:
Visit the province of Elsweyr!

High beyond the hills of the Niben lies the great desert plateau of central Elsweyr. From sandy desert wastes to rocky, red badlands, from grassy savannah to jungle coast, the lands of Anequina beckon.

This new region includes new landscapes, towns, quests, monsters, mounts, homes and items.
State.Name: Elsweyr the Deserts of Anequina

State.Author: Tiawar
State.Description: An OBSE plugin containing bug fixes for the Oblivion game engine.
State.Name: EngineBugFixes

Original.Name: Expanded Dungeons - Play Even Nicer Edition-46590-1-0.zip

State.Author: ArtInPinkerton
State.Description: Trimmed version of OWCND - Expanded Dungeons so that it doesn't conflict with Better Dungeons, Snu's Dungeons (WalkerInShadows version) or Ayleid Ruins Expanded.
State.Name: Expanded Dungeons - Play Nice Edition

State.Author: ArtInPinkerton
State.Description: Trimmed version of OWCND - Expanded Dungeons so that it doesn't conflict with Better Dungeons, Snu's Dungeons (WalkerInShadows version) or Ayleid Ruins Expanded.
State.Name: Expanded Dungeons - Play Nice Edition

State.Author: Phitt
State.Description: A tiny mod that adds falling stars to the game. They appear randomly at night when the sky is clear, the amount can be adjusted via console.
State.Name: Falling Stars

State.Author: qwerty
State.Description: Allows dismounting your horse almost twice as fast.
State.Name: Faster Horse Dismount

State.Author: mastergunforyou
State.Description:
Enemies don´t drop weapons to the ground anymore, the shields and weapons stay in their inventory. 

With this it´s save that you´ll get the gear you´ve earned by killing the target and they won´t glitch away and without searching.
State.Name: Floating weapons Fix (Enemies keep weapons in inventory)

State.Author: Asesino
State.Description:
Are you tired of staring at a big yellow exclamation mark, and not knowing where it came from?  Perhaps, you are just curious which mod decided to place that sink in your house.  Perhaps, that spell you have is a bit overpowered, but you don’t know where it came from.

Well, FormID Finder identifies all of these things.

NOTE: New version to ad
State.Name: FormID Finder

State.Author: ThePriest909
State.Description:
A supernatural action horror quest for "The Elder Scolls IV - Oblivion".



The player will have to deal with an ancient twisted evil, well hidden in the ages, 

through a journey in time and space and the hellish kingdom of the "Cursed Ones".
State.Name: GATES TO AESGAARD - Episode One

State.Author: ThePriest909
State.Description: Pain, the secret face of pleasure. Pleasure, a dark rose at the edge of pain. Together, as the everlasting flames that burn the soul of a true-loving heart, they sculptured the fifth element; the essence that the gods and the demons are made of.
State.Name: GATES TO AESGAARD - Episode Two

State.Author: ThePriest909
State.Description: Pain, the secret face of pleasure. Pleasure, a dark rose at the edge of pain. Together, as the everlasting flames that burn the soul of a true-loving heart, they sculptured the fifth element; the essence that the gods and the demons are made of.
State.Name: GATES TO AESGAARD - Episode Two

State.Author: Guinefort1
State.Description: Adds Glenmoril witch settlements to the remote expanses of Cyrodiil, who will serve as trainers and merchants
State.Name: Glenmoril Covens

State.Author: Ferretmyster
State.Description: All Runestones and Doomstones and Ayleid Wells glow and also produce unique sound.
State.Name: Glowing Stones

State.Author: kldkld1
State.Description: This mod adds mini game of goblin. (Mini-arena, Mini-racing game, Shooting gallery game, Slot game, Spot the difference, Potion catch, Number memory)
State.Name: Goblin Mini Games

State.Author: lazygecko
State.Description: Bethesda hates him! Overhaul your Oblivion sound with this one weird trick.
State.Name: GOSH - Gecko's Oblivion Sound overHaul

State.Author: Ferretmyster  monkeyangie laulajatar Brother123
State.Description: Make Grass Overhaul Compatible with all other mods and much Fps friendly.
State.Name: Grass Overhaul Universal

State.Author: Grimbot
State.Description: Texture replacers for Shivering Isles books and for DLCSpellTomes.
State.Name: Grimbots DLC Book Jackets

State.Author: Grimbot
State.Description: Texture replacers for Shivering Isles books and for DLCSpellTomes.
State.Name: Grimbots DLC Book Jackets

State.Author: Quarn and Dejunai
State.Description: This mod will make all flora behave more realistically by changing their appearance when you harvest them (whether you are successful or not). When you harvest a plant if its ingredient is a flower then the plant\'s flowers will disappear and so on, through some plants ingredients are roots which they don\'t have and you can\'t see them anywa
State.Name: Harvest Flora

State.Author: Ironman5000
State.Description: 100 secret Ayleid chests scattered across Tamriel and Shivering Isles, containing expensive and rare levelled loot.
State.Name: Hidden Treasures of Tamriel

State.Author: Guinefort1
State.Description: Adds flowers and shrines of Arkay to cemeteries
State.Name: Honor Thy Dead

State.Author: Ironman5000
State.Description: Adds hundreds of weapons to the game, fully integrated into all levelled lists and will level with the player.  Found in stores, loot, NPCs, and also adds uniques earned as rewards for completing quests.  All weapons will not break immersion, hence the name.
State.Name: Immersive Weapons

State.Author: Ironman5000
State.Description: This corrects a bug in Immersive weapons 2 where the Bashed Patch couldn't integrate it.
State.Name: Immersive Weapons 2 Bash Fixed

State.Author: hlvr
State.Description:
This mod retextures the fires and flames.
From the arcane fires at Arcane University and the big open fires in Kvatch, to the burning effect when using flame spells and the fire of the torch - all has been retextured.
Together, a total of 177 textures!

Let there be fire!
State.Name: Improved Fires and Flames

State.Author: Mikal33
State.Description: This is a retexture of several fruits,vegetables,meats & ingredients with 1024x1024,1024x512 & 512x256 textures.A uninstall list is included in the read me.
State.Name: Improved Fruits Vegetables and Meats

State.Author: Mikal33
State.Description: This is a retexture of several fruits,vegetables,meats & ingredients with 1024x1024,1024x512 & 512x256 textures.A uninstall list is included in the read me.
State.Name: Improved Fruits Vegetables and Meats

State.Author: Monkeyangie
State.Description: Simple mod that retextures the light beams in all the oblivion world, it decreases the greenish look of the original to a more yellowish warmer color.
State.Name: Improved LightBeam

State.Description:
>> Improved No Crosshair 1.0<<

By: nimski

The Improved No Crosshair removes the crosshair but keeps all mouse-over functionality in the game offering a increased cinematic experience.  The original Bethesda No Crosshair feature removes all mouse-over behaviors, making it difficult to pick up items and viewing an items steal-ability state.
State.Name: Improved No Crosshair

State.Author: Supreme and Soor
State.Description: Updated Initial Glow. Made for use with Fall of the Ayleids.
State.Name: Initial Glow Redux

Original.Name: Knights of the Nine Revelation 1_3_7 Full Install-42490-1-3-7.7z

State.Author: Lanceor
State.Description: Thousands of players have laughed, cried, thrilled and despaired as they undertook a perilous journey thousands of years into Tamriel's past, becoming the lone salvation for millions of lives. Do you have what it takes to avert the slavery of all humankind in this award-winning quest?
State.Name: Knights of the Nine Revelation

State.Author: Guinefort1
State.Description: Renovates 14 vanilla forts, making them manned by the Imperial Legion
State.Name: Legion-occupied Forts

State.Author: Laulajatar
State.Description: This mod adds some flowers to a few ground textures.
State.Name: Let there be Flowers

State.Author: monkeyangie
State.Description: Adds exterior light posts to all the main roads of Cyrodiil, and lanterns to settlements and inns. You can choose between 6 different light posts.
State.Name: Lights of Oblivion - Road Lanterns

State.Author: TheNiceOne
State.Description: Do you think its stupid that the weight of a potion is dependant of the ingredients used to make the first potion of that type? I do. That\'s why I made this mod which automatically makes every player-made potion weight exactly the same. Default is 0.2, but you can change this to 0.0 or whatever you want.
State.Name: Lightweight Potions

State.Author: Maskar
State.Description: LINK adds the ability to configure mods in-game, through a configuration menu, making configuring mods faster and more user friendly.
State.Name: LINK

State.Author: Trollf
State.Description: Loading Screens Themed AddOn is the mod that adds to the game 300 new loading screens with appropriate descriptions.
State.Name: Loading Screens Themed AddOn and DevKit

State.Author: Trollf
State.Description: In vanilla Oblivion there are only 43 different loading screens combined with 278 loading descriptions (however some of these are the same). This mod links each of these original descriptions with different and unique loading screen. Each loading description is connected with matching loading screen (hence \'themed\' in mod\'s name). This mea
State.Name: Loading Screens Themed Replacer

State.Author: Trollf
State.Description: Loading Screens Themed Replacer for Shivering Isles official expansion.
State.Name: Loading Screens Themed Replacer SI

State.Author: Ersh - original mod by Gribbleshnibit8
State.Description: A container loot menu for Oblivion, inspired by Fallout 4. Two UI styles to choose from.
State.Name: Loot Menu

State.Author: Ishmael
State.Description: Adds particle effects to magic projectiles and enchanted bows/arrows.
State.Name: Magic Visuals Overhaul

State.Author: Simyaz and Arilita
State.Description: Malevolent is a complex, multi-pathed, story-driven quest MOD revolving around the Player\'s relationship (be it good or bad) with a sentient suit of armour called \"The Armour of Malevolence.\" The Armour himself is a charismatic, manipulative and deceptive personality who likes to consider himself \"Articulate Evil\" and -after the Player dons th
State.Name: MALEVOLENT

State.Author: Guinefort1
State.Description: Adds map markers to numerous unmarked sites in the game
State.Name: Marking the Landmarks

State.Author: kyoma
State.Description: An OBSE Plugin that adds various additional UI functions , some quest functions and some misc functions.
State.Name: MenuQue - OBSE Plugin

State.Author: Always Z
State.Description: Ever wonder why all chests are safe?  Why some might not be a trap?  Then this mod is for you!  It adds in 150 chests to be found throughout Cyrodiil that have a chance of not only being trapped, but becoming a blood-thirsty mimic ready to bite your head off!
State.Name: Mimics

State.Author: Always Z
State.Description: Ever wonder why all chests are safe?  Why some might not be a trap?  Then this mod is for you!  It adds in 150 chests to be found throughout Cyrodiil that have a chance of not only being trapped, but becoming a blood-thirsty mimic ready to bite your head off!
State.Name: Mimics

State.Author: Guinefort1
State.Description: Adds a skooma dealer to each major city
State.Name: More Skooma Dealers

State.Author: Guinefort1
State.Description: Adds moths to the interiors of the Imperial Library and the temple grounds of the Cult of the Ancestor Moth.
State.Name: Mothy Moth Cult

State.Author: Phitt
State.Description: This mod adds an Argonian village called Mudwater to the Blackwood Forest. The village is made almost completely from new meshes and comes with four quests. The quests are rather short, but they are hopefully fun - there is much more to see than just the village.
State.Name: Mudwater

State.Author: L00
State.Description: Cleanest, lightweight and consistent weather overhaul for Oblivion.
State.Name: NAO - Natural and Atmospheric Oblivion

State.Author: Obertier
State.Description: This mod will upgrade old awful tree shadows by new-one :)
State.Name: New shadows for trees

State.Author: nuska and PushTheWinButton
State.Description: A streamlined replacement for the original Oblivion Character Overhaul plugin with all the NPC and hair changes removed, making it far more compatible and vanilla-friendly without losing the new race visuals.
State.Name: Oblivion Character Overhaul Compatibility Edition - OCO CE

State.Author: nuska
State.Description: A comprehensive, all-in-one revamp of Oblivion character heads. New head shapes, skin textures, normal maps, eye textures and some new hairstyles covering all races in the game, including Dremoras and Shivering Isles races, all built to a single unified art direction that adheres to the styles of Skyrim and TESO. Affects both player and NPCs.
State.Name: Oblivion Character Overhaul version 2

State.Author: Sam Lake and slart
State.Description: This mod adds cards you can collect, a new faction and quests.
State.Name: Oblivion Collectible Cards

State.Author: Ruthless Warrior
State.Description: This fix is placing missing cards on open spaces of Cyrodiil. It become possible to collect all of them now.
State.Name: Oblivion Collectible Cards - Missing Cards Fix

State.Author: Oblivion QOTW Team
State.Description: A new Miscellaneous Quest uploaded weekly
State.Name: Oblivion Quest Of The Week

State.Author: Oblivion QOTW Team
State.Description: A new Miscellaneous Quest uploaded weekly
State.Name: Oblivion Quest Of The Week

State.Author: Oblivion QOTW Team
State.Description: A new Miscellaneous Quest uploaded weekly
State.Name: Oblivion Quest Of The Week

State.Author: Oblivion QOTW Team
State.Description: A new Miscellaneous Quest uploaded weekly
State.Name: Oblivion Quest Of The Week

State.Author: canderoc
State.Description:
Oblivion Stereo Sound Overhaul
OSSO v0.9 (7/30/06) by PsychEroc 
*********************************************
Immerse yourself in the Oblivion experience with enhanced sounds including better sounding THUNDER, WIND, DUNGEONS, ARENA CROWDS, CRICKETS, etc! I have subtly enhanced most of Oblivion\'s stereo/ambient sounds and have increased varie
State.Name: Oblivion Stereo Sound Overhaul

State.Author: Just Chill
State.Description: A simple sprint function, without modifying the actual player Speed attribute. Requires OBSE.
State.Name: Oblivion Subtle Sprint

State.Author: Guinefort1
State.Description: Adds Knights of the Lamp to the Mages Guild and Arcane University facilities
State.Name: Order of the Lamp

State.Author: evercharmer
State.Description: High-res replacer for the paintings, similar to the default ones but meant to look like actual paintings.
State.Name: Painters Touch

State.Author: bettersweater
State.Description: Brings variety to Cyrodiils en SI paintings.
State.Name: Paintings Variation

State.Author: Sundabar21
State.Description: Tweak for varla and welkynd stones. It add some particle system to them
State.Name: Particled Ayleid Stones

State.Description: Adds 3 lore-friendly ruins to Cyrodiil

State.Author: DarkRider
State.Description: Reclaiming Sancre Tor is a questbased expansion pack for the Elder Scrolls IV: Oblivion. It adds approximately 40+ gameplay hours to the game, fleshing the Blades out into a complete joinable faction. Much more than just a quest mod, see for yourself!
State.Name: Reclaiming Sancre Tor

State.Author: DarkRider
State.Description: Reclaiming Sancre Tor is a questbased expansion pack for the Elder Scrolls IV: Oblivion. It adds approximately 40+ gameplay hours to the game, fleshing the Blades out into a complete joinable faction. Much more than just a quest mod, see for yourself!
State.Name: Reclaiming Sancre Tor

State.Description: Reclaiming Sancre Tor is a questbased expansion pack for the Elder Scrolls IV: Oblivion. It adds approximately 40+ gameplay hours to the game, fleshing the Blades out into a complete joinable faction. Much more than just a quest mod, see for yourself!

State.Description: Reclaiming Sancre Tor is a questbased expansion pack for the Elder Scrolls IV: Oblivion. It adds approximately 40+ gameplay hours to the game, fleshing the Blades out into a complete joinable faction. Much more than just a quest mod, see for yourself!

State.Description: A re-upload of Reneer\'s note mod with their permission
State.Name: Reneers note mod

State.Author: Lougian
State.Description: a retexture of all rocks
State.Name: Rocks retexture

State.Author: Chaos_ian7
State.Description: This mod adds 84 treasure chests distributed onto the roofs, walls, and mountain tops of Cyrodil and the Shivering Isles.
State.Name: Rooftop Rewards - A Treasure Hunting Mod for Acrobats

State.Author: Simyaz
State.Description:
RUINED-TAIL\'S TALE 3.01 - A Complete Rebuild 
===========================================
By Paul \'Simyaz\' Thomson

Ruined-Tail\'s Tale is a story-driven Companion-MOD featuring an Argonian Battlemage by the name of Ruined-Tail (or Ruin, for short). Throughout the course of your time together you will learn more about what drives Ruin and wh
State.Name: Ruined Tails Tale

State.Author: Simyaz
State.Description:
RUINED-TAIL\'S TALE 3.01 - A Complete Rebuild 
===========================================
By Paul \'Simyaz\' Thomson

Ruined-Tail\'s Tale is a story-driven Companion-MOD featuring an Argonian Battlemage by the name of Ruined-Tail (or Ruin, for short). Throughout the course of your time together you will learn more about what drives Ruin and wh
State.Name: Ruined Tails Tale

State.Author: junkacc11
State.Description: Seamless Replacers for OCOv2's Heads and Textures.
State.Name: Seamless - OCOv2

State.Author: Salmos
State.Description: There are plenty of secrets out there. All it takes is a good eye.
State.Name: Secrets

State.Author: AggressivePassivist
State.Description: A wandering weaponsmith gives you an offer- he\'ll make you a sentient weapon if you can just get him all the materials.  It promises to be powerful, but also potentially comical as the weapon will audibly comment on your adventures as you go.
State.Name: Sentient Weapon II

State.Author: Sneakstep
State.Description:
Hi,

I made a couple of [i]silent tracks[/i] of different length and put them into the explore, public and dungeon folder.

. 15\' - 1x
. 30\' - 2x
. 45\' - 2x
. 60\' - 2x
. 90\' - 1x

The effect is great! I didn\'t like it when one track played after another without any pause. Now there is a random chance of getting a silent
State.Name: Silent Tracks Expanded

State.Author: PushTheWinButton
State.Description: A lightweight mod that automatically creates saves at customisable intervals and when you level up. Replaces the buggy vanilla autosave system.
State.Name: Simple Saves Plus

State.Author: Tesfallout
State.Description:
A quest-friendly Tutorial skipper.
This mod is very easily installed and lets people who don\'t know the controls choose whether to use the tutorial or not.
This creates no known problems with the main quest and gives a \"tutorial-similar\" character boost to help you get started.(stats, and money for equipment), Now includes an optional... (cont
State.Name: Skip Tutorial v3

State.Author: Strategy Master
State.Description:
Annoyed by the constant official plugin pop ups at the start of a new game?



Wished that the official plugins would start in more appropriate fashions?



These esps will stop the official plugins from starting automatically and start more naturally.
State.Name: SM DLC Plugin Refurbish

State.Author: JWadd
State.Description: An artistic rendition of stone. If you are looking for something different, this is it. Added support for Better Dungeons and Snu's Dungeons.
State.Name: Strange Caves - A 2K Cave Retexture

State.Author: MigTheGreat
State.Description: This mod is a tweaked compilation of the best combat sounds \"Combat Sounds 300\", \"Walther\'s Oblivion Combat Sounds\", and \"Improved Bow Sounds\" have to offer. Using the strengths of each mod, I have replaced many of the game\'s default sounds with more realistic counterparts. However the vanilla sounds that were of too much quality to be impr
State.Name: Symphony of Violence - Combat Sound Enhancement

State.Author: Rev Elevenclaw
State.Description: For the love of cats!
State.Name: Tales from Elsweyr Anequina-Rev's Redo

State.Author: Cliffworms
State.Description: Adds 14 quests with multiple paths to be found across Cyrodiil. Dialogue is choice-based with skill checks, quest NPCs and items are not essential, quests have a time limit. These quests are inspired by the Elder Scrolls 2 : Daggerfall. Part of the Oblivifall project.
State.Name: Tales of Cyrodiil

State.Author: Simyaz and Arilita
State.Description:
TEARS OF THE FIEND 
================== 

Release 1.22 (Dated as of: 28th December 2007) 
By Paul \'Simyaz\' Thomson 


\"A Demon whose entire existence thrives on manipulation.

A General whose entire existence is dictated by the Demon that drives him.

And You, whose entire existence has somehow manipulated and dictated the existence
State.Name: Tears Of The Fiend

State.Author: TheNiceOne
State.Description: A patch to Tears of the Fiend 1.2.2, that delays Pellew\'s visit to a time you may be strong enough to survive.
State.Name: Tears of the Fiend Delayer

State.Author: Gruftikus and Lightwave
State.Description: This tool converts the landscape heightmap of all your mods into landscape LOD meshes. It can be configured by a script and adapted to different requirements.
State.Name: Landscape LOD generator tes4ll-v5

State.Author: Ervvin
State.Description: Discover the ancient Ayleid teleporting network of Step stones, find out how to activate it, and then use the Steps to discover a new way of traveling around Cyrodiil, and search for new unknown Ayleid sites.
State.Name: The Ayleid Steps

State.Author: slowpard
State.Description: The Name Says It All
State.Name: The Ayleid Steps - Compatibility Patches

State.Author: Me
State.Description: An extensive quest mod months in the making with hundreds of lines of dialogue created using OBVA Synth. Rise in the ranks of the East Empire Company, and complete quests solve problems for the Company in this large DLC-like mod.
State.Name: The East Empire Company

State.Author: md5madman
State.Description: The Firmament is a lore-friendly mod and quest for the star-gazers of Tamriel. Follow this questline to receive unique, monthly blessings by the star signs above. Gain magical enhancements unique to each monthly constellation to aid in your explorations of Tamriel.
State.Name: The Firmament

State.Author: DemonLord7654
State.Description: The Forgotten Dungeon is a dungeon crawler mod. In this mod you will adventure through unique and random vaults finding new items, fighting all new creatures, and boss battling!  Are you ready to put your adventuring skills to the test?
State.Name: The Forgotten Dungeon

State.Author: Kafana - Nikola Luburic
State.Description:
The Golden Crest is a major pirate quest mod that adds two new factions that can be joined, the Abecean Pirates and the Straight Arrow, a bounty hunter, treasure hunter, outlaw hideout tavern where pretty much anything goes.



Raid ships, pillage island outposts and castles, explore large and challenging dungeons and fight skilled and st
State.Name: The Golden Crest - A Major Pirate Quest

State.Author: BFreyermuth
State.Description: This is a slightly modified .esp for Heart of the Dead that I was able to de-integrate from CM Partners, as the mod can create conflict with other companion-related mods and has some minor issues that, at least for some people, can cause random CTDs. I'm also including a few old (and one new) patches also de-integrated from CM Partners.
State.Name: Heart of the Dead De-Integrated

State.Author: Uncle Ju and his crew
State.Description: There is a certain Seven Roads Tavern near a lively crossroad in the east of Cyrodiil. Every visitor there is greeted by some fresh rumours and unusual and fun company, as well as by long and really exciting adventures. 'They say some thieves stole a very expensive unique ring from a mage called Ortharzel,' the Tavern's owner tells you.
State.Name: The Living And The Dead

State.Author: qwerty
State.Description: A collection of various tweaks and changes to The Lost Spires quest mod.
State.Name: The Lost Spires - Tweaks and Enhancements

State.Author: Velorien
State.Description:
A quest mod that revolves around a large Ayleid Ruin.

Discover the secrets of the long-lost Ayleid city of Minlorada, and of the Great Ayleid Well legends speak of.

Features a 5-level dungeon, new weapons and armor, a unique undead companion, and much more!
State.Name: The Well of Minlorada

State.Author: Simplicissimus
State.Description: With the installation of darker dungeons and dark textures, an ordinary torch stopped lighting enough to me. Therefore, I made this simple mod, with which the torch began to shine much brighter, without turning into a owerpowered lamp that illuminates vast territories at once.
State.Name: Torch More Brighter

State.Author: Maskar
State.Description: Ultimate Leveling changes how the player character levels, removing the need for efficient leveling and making character development more diverse.
State.Name: Ultimate Leveling

Original.Name: Unique Artifacts for Unique People - Full Version-49871-1-3-1-1583989530.7z

State.Author: Dispensation
State.Description: Adds unique weapons to the notable NPCs in Oblivion and optionally the DLC.
State.Name: Unique Artifacts for Unique People

Original.Name: Unique Artifacts for Unique People - Full Version-49871-1-4-1629962979.7z

State.Author: Dispensation
State.Description: Adds unique weapons to the notable NPCs in Oblivion and optionally the DLC.
State.Name: Unique Artifacts for Unique People

Original.Name: UL Compatibility Patches Compilation WIZBAIN v13-13834-13.7z

State.Author: Vorians and various others
State.Description: Various Compatibility Patches for Unique Landscapes and the many mods which conflict.
State.Name: Unique Landscapes Compatibility Patches

State.Author: Various
State.Description: This is a compilation of the Unique Landscapes mods, which change many outdoor locations, making them more diverse and interesting.
State.Name: Unique Landscapes Compilation

State.Author: Quarn and Kivan and Arthmoor and PrinceShroob
State.Description: The aim of this mod is to fix the bugs existing in the official mods released by Bethesda.
State.Name: Unofficial Oblivion DLC Patches

State.Author: Quarn and Kivan and Arthmoor and PrinceShroob
State.Description: An Oblivion mod that fixes over 2,500 bugs (and 70,000 object placement errors.)
State.Name: Unofficial Oblivion Patch

State.Author: Quarn and Kivan and Arthmoor and PrinceShroob
State.Description: This mod is a joint effort to fix the vast amount of bugs currently existing in the Shivering Isles expansion pack for Oblivion v1.2.0416.
State.Name: Unofficial Shivering Isles Patch

State.Author: DemonLord7654
State.Description: Voyage: Deserts Of Oblivion is a new world exploration, dungeon delving mod with survival aspects and multi-phased boss battles. In this mod the player finds themselves lost in a far away desert realm somewhere in Oblivion and has to explore its vast sandy wastelands looking for a way out.
State.Name: Voyage - Deserts Of Oblivion

State.Author: Laulajatar
State.Description: This mod adds VWD models for houses into the tamriel worldspace for Leyawiin.
State.Name: VWD for Leyawiin

State.Author: falcon661
State.Description: Solve a murder mystery. Take up an ancient legacy. New castle home, storyline, epic rewards, puzzles, companions and so much more!
State.Name: Wintermist

State.Author: Guinefort1
State.Description: Adds lore-friendly shrines to households and businesses throughout Cyrodiil
State.Name: Worship in Cyrodiil

State.Author: MisanthropicShayna
State.Description: This is a complete remake of my previous mod: MouseLock, which is a utility designed to solve the bug that occurs when someone with more than one monitor moves their mouse in-game which continues to move the Windows cursor in the background, making it go off-screen to other monitors which can cause unwanted inputs (e.g. scrolling a window)
State.Name: CursorLocker Redux

State.Author: DarklyDreaming
State.Description: Tool to fix tears in landscape.
State.Name: Land Magic

State.Author: ElminsterAU and the xEdit Team
State.Description: TES4Edit is the Oblivion version of xEdit. xEdit is an advanced graphical module viewer/editor and conflict detector.
State.Name: TES4Edit

State.Author: ElminsterAU
State.Description: One-Click DistantLOD Generator
State.Name: TES4LODGen

State.Author: lmstearn
State.Description: BAIN install packages for popular UI mods originally bundled as Fomods for OBMM. Wrye Bash, still being maintained and supported for Oblivion is now the first choice for players of Oblivion.
State.Name: UI Wizard Installer Packages for Wrye Bash

State.Author: Willock
State.Description: Ultra High-Resolution fonts for Darnified UI, rebuilt using the original source TrueType fonts in 4x the resolution provided with Darnified UI.
State.Name: UHD Fonts for Darnified UI

State.Author: Ferretmyster
State.Description: Mod overhauls the grass in oblivion.
State.Name: Oblivion Grass Overhaul

State.Author: Simyaz and Arilita
State.Description: Malevolent is a complex, multi-pathed, story-driven quest MOD revolving around the Player\'s relationship (be it good or bad) with a sentient suit of armour called \"The Armour of Malevolence.\" The Armour himself is a charismatic, manipulative and deceptive personality who likes to consider himself \"Articulate Evil\" and -after the Player dons th
State.Name: MALEVOLENT

State.Author: Alenet GBRplus
State.Description: Lite version of Oblivion reloaded, compiled from 8.4 and 9.0 sources.
State.Name: Oblivion Reloaded Lite (UNOFFICIAL)

State.Author: maczopikczo
State.Description: Lockpicking interface upgrade for all you gentlemen thieves out there. Because we might be bandits, but we're no strangers to style and sophistication.
State.Name: Pick Me - lockpicking interface retexture

State.Author: Jarod
State.Description: Attempts to fix some issues the original Really Textured Normal Maps for Vanilla mod had.
State.Name: Really Textured Normal Maps - Updated

State.Description: This mod adds VWD models for all town house models.
State.Name: VWD for Town Houses

State.Description: Some simple *_far meshes for vanilla (and some mods) ships, making them visible on the distance. Little to no performance impact.
State.Name: VWD Ships

State.Author: JRoush
State.Description: AddActorValues adds script functions for much greater control over actor values.  It also allows modders to add \'new\' actor values for their own use.
State.Name: AddActorValues

State.Author: Oooiii
State.Description: Adds new book jackets and icons to the books from Frostcrag Spire, Battlehorn Castle and others.
State.Name: Book Jackets for Misc DLC

State.Author: Emerald Demond
State.Description: From the sandy beaches of the Abecean Sea to the swampy marshes of Blackwood, from the chilly windswept cliffs of Blizzard Peak to the boiling lava tunnels of the Great Mine, The Dwarves Of The Mountain takes you on the first chapter of an immerse journey, where you are thrown into a society of troubled Dwarves who are being ruled by an iron-fisted
State.Name: Chapter 1 - The Dwarves Of The Mountain

State.Author: kartoffels
State.Description: Upscaled textures for all Oblivion DLC. 4x and 2x version.
State.Name: DLC Upscaled Textures (DLCUT)

State.Author: Elys
State.Description:
This OBSE plugin makes Oblivion play a 8 seconds duration silent voice for any missing voice file.



- If the subtitles are turned off, Elys_USV will force display subtitles for missing voice files.

- You will have up to 8 seconds to read long subtitles when there is no voice existing for an Oblivion plugin.

- Modder creating
State.Name: OBSE -Elys- Universal Silent Voice

State.Description:
Allow configuration of the delay between hours while waiting or sleeping.

OBSE plugin (no esp).
State.Name: Faster Sleep Wait (OBSE)

State.Description: Small obse plugin that prevents resistances & spell effectiveness from rounding magnitudes down to the nearest integer.
State.Name: FractionalMagicDamage

State.Author: monkeyangie
State.Description: Replaces the grass textures with an Atlas one, for better performance
State.Name: Oblivion Grass Overhaul - Atlas Textures

State.Author: Laulajatar
State.Description: This mod takes the Far Cry inspired grass by betty and expands it to other areas of Cyrodiil and even the Shivering Isles and the Paradise.

State.Description: This mod takes the Far Cry inspired grass by betty and expands it to other areas of Cyrodiil and even the Shivering Isles and the Paradise.

State.Description: Hi-Res (2048x2048) DX3 road textures - diffuse maps and normal maps with transparencies that make use of Oblivion Reloaded terrain and Detailed Terrain shaders.
State.Name: Imperial Roads - Detailed road textures

State.Author: hlvr
State.Description:
This mod retextures the fires and flames.
From the arcane fires at Arcane University and the big open fires in Kvatch, to the burning effect when using flame spells and the fire of the torch - all has been retextured.
Together, a total of 177 textures!

Let there be fire!
State.Name: Improved Fires and Flames

Koldorns LOD Noise Replacer for Patch 1.2

Replaces the noise effect on LOD textures to something I find better.

Installation
------------
Place the Textures folder in your Oblivion\\Data directory and overwrite as it asks. Or if you prefer the old or the stronger effect one, simply unrar t
State.Name: Koldorns LOD Noise Replacer

State.Author: Xerus
State.Description: This mod replaces the vanilla landscape LOD textures in Cyrodiil and Shivering Isles with improved textures. Thus, the visual quality of the distant landscape will increase, without a significant performance impact.
State.Name: Landscape LOD Textures by Xerus

State.Author: Ersh - original mod by Gribbleshnibit8
State.Description: A container loot menu for Oblivion, inspired by Fallout 4. Two UI styles to choose from.

State.Description: A container loot menu for Oblivion, inspired by Fallout 4. Two UI styles to choose from.

State.Author: Ishmael
State.Description: Adds particle effects to magic projectiles and enchanted bows/arrows.
State.Name: Magic Visuals Overhaul

State.Author: kyoma
State.Description: An OBSE Plugin that adds various additional UI functions , some quest functions and some misc functions.
State.Name: MenuQue - OBSE Plugin

State.Author: InsanitySorrow
State.Description: This project is a large undertaking with the aim of (slowly) fixing or replacing broken/ugly meshes found throughout the game's world.
State.Name: Mesh Improvement Project

State.Author: DEEJMASTER333
State.Description: Adds a normal map for blooddecal.dds in the mod Better Blood.
State.Name: Normal Map for Better Blood

State.Author: iranrmrf
State.Description: This plugin fixes the Oblivion mod limit bug. It allows a maximum of 255 plugins to be loaded.
State.Name: OBL Mod Limit Fix

State.Author: Ersh
State.Description: Micro stutter tick fix, high framerate fix, true FOV fix, alt-tab freeze fix in fullscreen and G-Sync/FreeSync working in borderless/windowed mode.
State.Name: Oblivion Display Tweaks

State.Author: JRoush
State.Description: OBME extends the Oblivion magic system to make it more general and open to mod makers.

State.Author: Alenet GBRplus
State.Description: Lite version of Oblivion reloaded, compiled from 8.4 and 9.0 sources.

State.Description: OBSE required.  For Oblivion version 1.2.416 only.  Makes Oblivion not stutter so much, improves stability.

State.Author: kartoffels
State.Description: Upscaled textures for Oblivion. Comes in default 4x or 2x version, with availability to mix and match modules. Should look like vanilla, but less 2006.
State.Name: Oblivion Upscaled Textures (OUT)

State.Author: qwerty
State.Description: Manually made models for distant objects with next to none performance impact.

State.Name: Shivering Isles Upscaled Textures (SIUT)

State.Author: DavidJCobb
State.Description: An OBSE DLL that forces Oblivion to handle BSAs and loose files the same way that Skyrim does. No more mucking around with file timestamps!

OBSE plugin (no esp)

Original.Name: Better Underwater for OR and ORL-50601-1-00-1607426732.7z

State.Author: Aninomouse9299
State.Description:
Tired of that blue-tint in your Night-Eye? Is it too dark? Now better Night-Eye shader options!

Using Oblivion Reloaded or ORL, jumped into water and asked "Why can't I see anything???" Now better Underwater shaders for better visibility!

Better Underwater & Night-Eye Shaders for Oblivion Reloaded & you :)
State.Name: Better Underwater and Night-Eye Shaders for Oblivion Reloaded

State.Author: maczopikczo
State.Description: How to make your bookshelves beautiful and impress your guests. Deluxe coffee table editions of Knights of the Nine titles.
State.Name: Book Jackets KOTN HD update

State.Author: coronerra
State.Description: Better Animation Skeleton with ALL the bones in every custom skeleton for Oblivion. Better Bouncing Boobs for HGEC. Better lower body for Demons with textures. What more can a person want?
State.Name: Coronerras Maximum Compatibility Skeletons

State.Author: kartoffels
State.Description: Upscaled textures for all Oblivion DLC. 4x and 2x version.
State.Name: DLC Upscaled Textures (DLCUT)

State.Author: sefmonsta
State.Description: Makes all cobwebs visible from both sides.
State.Name: Double Sided Cobwebs

Retexture of Dungeons, Caves and Sewers

Install: drag and drop the "dungeons" folder at the following path: Oblivion/data/textures
State.Name: Dungeons (Chargen Caves Sewers) Retexture

State.Author: maczopikczo
State.Description: Something to lean on when you're knocked off your feet by villains or booze.
State.Name: Farm fence retexture and UV maps

State.Author: kartoffels

State.Author: Uncle Ju and his crew
State.Description: There is a certain Seven Roads Tavern near a lively crossroad in the east of Cyrodiil. Every visitor there is greeted by some fresh rumours and unusual and fun company, as well as by long and really exciting adventures. 'They say some thieves stole a very expensive unique ring from a mage called Ortharzel,' the Tavern's owner tells you.
State.Name: The Living And The Dead

State.Author: Publick Gamer
State.Description: Ever tried to immerse yourself in conversations between your character and an npc, only to find your character supposedly walks up to people saying 'Rumors' and expecting an answer. Well worry no more, as this mod currently makes around 250 changes to well over 400 npcs, improving the overall player dialogue experience.
State.Name: Realistic Player Dialogue Overhaul
